# pds-progress



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property                   | Attribute      | Description                                                                                                                                 | Type      | Default     |
| -------------------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `animated`                 | `animated`     | Determines whether or not progress is animated.                                                                                             | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `componentId` _(required)_ | `component-id` | A unique identifier used for the underlying component `id` attribute and the label `for` attribute.                                         | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `fillColor`                | `fill-color`   | Sets the progress fill color. Accepts a color token or a [valid color value](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/color_value). | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `label` _(required)_       | `label`        | String used for label text. Label is visually hidden but required for better accessibility.                                                 | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `percent`                  | `percent`      | Sets the progress fill pecentage and visually displayed when `show-percentage=true`.                                                        | `number`  | `0`         |
| `showPercent`              | `show-percent` | Determines whether or not the percent value should be displayed as text.                                                                    | `boolean` | `false`     |


----------------------------------------------
